name: Project
tagline: This is my personal project code
body:
# Sample size calculation for pre-post survey R code:

`PrePostSS <- function(P1,P2,Za,Zb,DE,NRR){
	P=(P1+P2)/2; Q=1-P
	g1=Za*sqrt(2*P*Q)
	g2=Zb*sqrt(P1*(1-P1)+P2*(1-P2))
	n1=(g1-g2)^2
	n2=(P2-P1)^2
	n=((n1/n2)*DE)*(1+NRR)
	return(n)
}

#P1 = Baseline prevalence
#P2 = Endline prevalence
#Za = Significance level
#Zb = Power
#DE = Design effect
#NRR = Non-response rate

PrePostSS(0.50,0.70, 1.96, -0.842, 1, 0.00)`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
